boat.name: Flamingo
boat.full_description:
Flamingo has very little documentation. David Smallwood laid 'Flamingo' up in 1981 and embarked on restoration work in 1995 with a projected launch date 2002. Sadly, he died before completing the task.

Tim Davey bought her from David's widow, more to prevent her being scrapped than any serious intent to fix her up. Jonathan bought her from Tim in August 2014. She had some repairs to the planking, a new engine, some pretty poor interior fitting out, the rig has been restored, she has a new rudder, new deck and a reconditioned Baby Blake toilet.

In 2014 she was moved into Jonathan's orchard where he hopes to complete the work. Visit the boat's website to see progress.
boat.construction_details: Carvel Pitch pine planking rivetted on oak frames.
boat.short_description: Flamingo is a yacht built in 1930. A major restoration was begun in 1995 and is ongoing in 2014 after two changes in ownership.
